name: Easter Eggster - The Easter Egg Hunt
name_original: Easter Eggster - The Easter Egg Hunt
description:
Intro

Easter Eggster is a free and fresh easter egg hunting game! Find easter eggs, easter nests and easter baskets and beat the highscore!

Available for Easter 2022 and downloadable for free for Windows (64 Bit). 

Stay tuned here and don't forget to follow on Twitter for more games!

How To Play

After launching the game and clicking on the "Start Game" button on the title screen use the W,A,S,D keys to navigate and the mouse to look around. Use SHIFT to run.

No controller support.

Feedback and Bug Reports

Feedback is always welcome - feel free to comment below so I can get back to you ASAP!

Release History

  • 13.04.2022 1.0.0 Initial Release
  • 13.04.2022  1.0.1 Bugfix Release - one egg for area 3 was located in area 4
  • 14.04.2022 1.0.2 Bugfix Release - another egg for area 3 was located in area 4 and one basket/nest was barely visible in area 3
  • 14.04.2022 Replaces 1.0.2 self-extracting archive with a normal ZIP file because there were some issues
